name: Crustless Apple Pie
preparation: Combine apples, spice, and sugar, if using, in a Rectangular Steamer. Cover; microwave on high 3–5 min. Apples should be tender, but not mushy. Top with Greek yogurt.

products.name: Apple Pie Spice
summary: Move over pumpkin spice; it's time for Apple Pie Spice to shine! Perfect for leveling up the taste of fall-inspired baking, it's also great on top of oatmeal, in a frothy late or smoothie – or anywhere you want a punch of apple pie flavour.

products.name: Rectangular Steamer
summary: Easy to clean. Easy to serve. Rectangular, silicone steamer is perfect for side dishes & desserts.
